title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

Introducing the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop, a powerful and versatile device designed to elevate your productivity and creativity. Packed with cutting-edge features and advanced technologies, this laptop is perfect for professionals, students, and creative enthusiasts.

**Product Details:**

- **Chip Options:** Choose between the M2 Pro and M2 Max chips, both offering exceptional performance. The M2 Pro chip features 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and a maximum unified memory of 32GB. The M2 Max chip boasts 12 CPU cores, a maximum GPU core count of 38, and an impressive maximum unified memory of 96GB.

- **Battery Life:** Enjoy an impressive battery life of up to 22 hours, ensuring you can work, create, and stay productive all day long.

- **Compatibility:** Seamlessly integrate with popular software and applications such as Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, iPhone apps, and iPad apps. Unlock your full potential and accomplish more with ease.

- **Display:** Immerse yourself in a stunning visual experience with the 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. Featuring Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content support, and pro reference modes, this display delivers exceptional clarity and vividness.

- **Camera and Audio:** Stay connected and engage in crystal-clear video calls with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera. Enjoy immersive sound quality with the three-mic array and the six-speaker sound system featuring Spatial Audio, providing a truly immersive audio experience.

- **Ports and Connectivity:** Experience versatile connectivity options with the MagSafe charging, Thunderbolt 4 (x3) ports, SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and a headphone jack. Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 for fast and reliable wireless connectivity.

- **Keyboard:** The Magic Keyboard offers a comfortable typing experience with its full-height function key row. Additionally, it features Touch ID for secure and convenient authentication.

- **Cross-Device Features:** Benefit from cross-device features such as Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages, seamlessly integrating your MacBook Pro with your iPhone and iPad.

- **Build:** The MacBook Pro Laptop features an all-aluminum unibody enclosure, providing durability and a sleek design that stands out.

- **Software:** Enjoy free software updates for years, ensuring you always have access to the latest features and improvements.

- **Memory and Storage:** With 16GB of unified memory, multitasking becomes effortless. The 512GB SSD storage offers ample space for your files, documents, and multimedia.

- **Color:** The MacBook Pro Laptop is available in the elegant Space Gray color, exuding sophistication and style.

Upgrade your computing experience with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. Get ready to unleash your creativity, enhance your productivity, and stay connected like never before.

**Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop is a powerful and versatile device that offers exceptional performance and a range of impressive features. With its sleek design and advanced technology, this laptop is perfect for professionals, creatives, and tech enthusiasts.

**Product Details:**

- **Chip:** The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop is equipped with the latest M2 Pro or M2 Max chip, offering incredible processing power. Choose between the M2 Pro with 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and a maximum unified memory of 32GB, or the M2 Max with 12 CPU cores, a maximum GPU cores of 38, and a maximum unified memory of 96GB.

- **Battery Life:** Enjoy extended usage with a battery life of up to 22 hours, ensuring that you can work and play without worrying about running out of power.

- **Compatibility:** This laptop is compatible with a range of software and apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, iPhone apps, and iPad apps. Stay productive and creative with seamless integration across devices.

- **Display:** Experience stunning visuals on the 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. With features like Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR, and pro reference modes, you can enjoy vibrant colors and exceptional clarity.

- **Camera and Audio:** Stay connected with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera for high-quality video calls. The three-mic array and six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio deliver immersive audio experiences for your entertainment and communication needs.

- **Ports and Connectivity:** The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop offers a range of ports and wireless connectivity options. It features MagSafe charging, Thunderbolt 4 ports, an SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and a headphone jack. Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

- **Keyboard:** The Magic Keyboard provides a comfortable typing experience with its full-height function key row and Touch ID for secure authentication.

- **Cross-Device Features:** Enjoy convenient features like Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages integration for seamless communication and productivity across your Apple devices.

- **Build:** The all-aluminum unibody enclosure ensures durability and a premium look and feel.

- **Software:** Benefit from free software updates, ensuring that your laptop stays up-to-date with the latest features and improvements.

- **Memory and Storage:** The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop comes with 16GB of unified memory, providing smooth multitasking capabilities. It also offers a spacious 512GB SSD for fast and reliable storage.

- **Color:** The laptop is available in a sleek and stylish Space Gray color.

Upgrade to the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop and experience the ultimate combination of power, performance, and versatility. Whether you're a professional, creative, or tech enthusiast, this laptop is designed to meet all your computing needs.

**Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

Introducing the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop, a powerful and versatile device designed for professionals and creatives. With its cutting-edge features and sleek design, this laptop is the perfect companion for all your computing needs.

**Chip Options:**
- M2 Pro: Featuring 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and a maximum unified memory of 32GB.
- M2 Max: Equipped with 12 CPU cores, a maximum GPU cores of 38, and an impressive maximum unified memory of 96GB.

**Battery Life:** Enjoy up to 22 hours of uninterrupted usage, allowing you to work or play without worrying about recharging.

**Compatibility:** Seamlessly run your favorite software and apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, iPhone apps, and iPad apps.

**Display:** Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with a 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. Experience extreme dynamic range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, and pro reference modes.

**Camera and Audio:** Stay connected with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera and enjoy crystal-clear audio with the three-mic array and six-speaker sound system. Experience spatial audio for an enhanced listening experience.

**Ports and Connectivity:** Conveniently charge your laptop with MagSafe technology. Connect your devices with three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and a headphone jack. Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 technology.

**Keyboard:** The Magic Keyboard offers a comfortable typing experience, complete with a full-height function key row and Touch ID for secure authentication.

**Cross-Device Features:** Enjoy seamless integration with your iPhone and iPad, enabling features such as Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages.

**Build:** The all-aluminum unibody enclosure provides durability and a sleek aesthetic, making it a stylish addition to your workspace.

**Software:** Receive free software updates for years to come, ensuring your laptop stays up to date with the latest features and improvements.

**Memory and Storage:** Experience smooth multitasking with 16GB of unified memory. Store all your files, photos, and videos with the spacious 512GB SSD.

**Color:** The Space Gray color option adds a touch of sophistication to your laptop.

Upgrade your computing experience with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. Get ready to unleash your creativity and productivity like never before.

Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop

The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop is a powerful and versatile device designed to enhance your productivity and creativity. With its advanced features and cutting-edge technology, it is the perfect companion for professionals, students, and creatives alike.

Key Features:

1. Chip: Choose between the M2 Pro and M2 Max options. The M2 Pro variant offers 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and a maximum unified memory of 32GB. The M2 Max variant features 12 CPU cores, a maximum of 38 GPU cores, and an impressive maximum unified memory of 96GB.

2. Battery Life: Experience long-lasting performance with up to 22 hours of battery life, ensuring you can work or enjoy your favorite content without interruption.

3. Compatibility: Seamlessly integrate with popular software such as Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, and even iPhone and iPad apps, allowing you to work across multiple platforms effortlessly.

4. Display: Enjoy a stunning visual experience on the 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. With features like Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR, and pro reference modes, you can expect exceptional image quality for your professional and multimedia needs.

5. Camera and Audio: Stay connected with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera and enjoy crystal-clear video calls. The three-mic array and six-speaker sound system provide immersive audio quality, while Spatial Audio enhances your listening experience.

6. Ports and Connectivity: The MacBook Pro Laptop comes with convenient MagSafe charging, Thunderbolt 4 ports (x3), an SDXC card slot, HDMI, and a headphone jack. Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless technologies.

7. Keyboard: The Magic Keyboard offers a comfortable typing experience, and features like the full-height function key row and Touch ID make your workflow more efficient.

8. Cross-Device Features: Benefit from cross-device features such as Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages integration, enabling seamless communication between your MacBook Pro and other Apple devices.

9. Build and Design: The MacBook Pro Laptop boasts an all-aluminum unibody enclosure, providing durability and a sleek aesthetic.

10. Software: Enjoy free software updates for years, ensuring you have access to the latest features and improvements.

11. Memory and Storage: The MacBook Pro Laptop comes with 16GB of unified memory, allowing for smooth multitasking. Additionally, it offers ample storage space with a 512GB SSD.

12. Color: The MacBook Pro Laptop is available in the elegant and timeless Space Gray color.

The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop combines top-of-the-line performance, stunning visuals, and seamless integration to deliver an exceptional user experience. Whether you're a professional, student, or creative, this laptop is designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Upgrade to the MacBook Pro Laptop and unlock your full potential.

**Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

Introducing the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop, a powerful and versatile device designed to meet all your computing needs. With its cutting-edge features and sleek design, this laptop is perfect for professionals and creatives alike.

**Chip Options:**
- M2 Pro: Equipped with 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and a maximum unified memory of 32GB.
- M2 Max: Featuring 12 CPU cores, a maximum of 38 GPU cores, and an impressive maximum unified memory of 96GB.

**Battery Life:** Enjoy up to 22 hours of uninterrupted usage on a single charge, ensuring you can stay productive throughout the day.

**Compatibility:** Seamlessly integrate with popular software such as Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, as well as iPhone and iPad apps.

**Display:** Immerse yourself in a stunning visual experience with a 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. With features like Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR, and pro reference modes, every image and video will come to life.

**Camera and Audio:** Stay connected with crystal-clear video calls using the 1080p FaceTime HD camera. The three-mic array captures your voice with precision, while the six-speaker sound system delivers immersive audio. Experience Spatial Audio for an enhanced listening experience.

**Ports and Connectivity:** Enjoy effortless charging with MagSafe technology. Connect your devices with Thunderbolt 4 ports (3x), an SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and a headphone jack. Stay connected wirelessly with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

**Keyboard:** The Magic Keyboard provides a comfortable typing experience, with a full-height function key row and Touch ID for secure login.

**Cross-Device Features:** Seamlessly work across your Apple devices with features like Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages.

**Build:** The all-aluminum unibody enclosure not only gives the laptop a sleek and premium look, but it also ensures durability and longevity.

**Software:** Benefit from free software updates, keeping your laptop up to date with the latest features and enhancements.

**Memory and Storage:** With 16GB of unified memory, multitasking and running demanding applications is a breeze. Store all your files, documents, and media with the 512GB SSD.

**Color:** The Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop comes in the elegant Space Gray color, exuding sophistication.

Elevate your productivity and creativity with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. Experience unmatched performance and exceptional features in a sleek and stylish package.

**Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**
